name: UnofficialImagineClassicalAcademySchoolLunch
0:
”Alexa ask Imagine Lunch what is for lunch today”
”What is for lunch tomorrow”
”What was for lunch the last day of school”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: imagine lunch
des: Unofficial school lunch for Imagine Classical Academy Indigo Ranch in Colorado Springs for parents. Parents of the students can ask for lunch today, tomorrow or a specific day. School lunch menu is posted about a month out.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
